column5: Hi Guys, Very long story but the short version is I am looking for a partner for 3 days of fishing at Trout Rock Lodge on Great Slave June 23-26. I originally was planning a trip to GSL back in Nov. I couldn't get an opening that worked at Trout Rock. Then about a week ago I got a call about a 3 day opening at Trout Rock that backs up to another trip I had booked. I phoned my buddies and had no luck. If I don't find a boat partner I am going to lose this chance to fish arguably some of the best pike water in NA. The price is 2445USD. The trip is 3 days. I'd really like to fish this piece of water but I cant afford to pay double for the 3 days. Anyways anyone up for a a quick trip and a bunch of big pike prime time? Please message me here if interested and we can schedule some time to talk.http://www.enodah.com is the website for Trout Rock. Brett
Just tried to open site and my anti virus Avast said the site was infected with a virus.
I just opened the site and I have Avast. Make sure your definitions are up to date.Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk

Frank, went again to site and hit 'contact' and got the following from Avast: Threat Secured. we'veve safley aborted connectionon www.enodah.com because it was infected with HTML:Hideme-F(Tri) whatevertht is. If you also hit 'contact' and did not get the same with Avast, not sure why? Phil

Thats odd....I have a mac and it is usually super cautious about different websites and I can open it without anything happening. If you want to do a web search check out "Trout Rock and In-Fisherman" or Search "best pike water in North America". There are several articles from third parties also talking about their pike fishing.Brett
I sent you a PMSent from my iPad using Tapatalk
